cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jijitsu

sentence.kanji: それは全て事実ですか。
sentence.romaji: sore ha subete jijitsu desu ka
sentence.english: Is it all true?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's omote

sentence.kanji: 表に人が来ています。
sentence.romaji: omoteni hito ga kite imasu
sentence.english: Someone has come to the door.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hyou

sentence.kanji: この表を見てください。
sentence.romaji: kono hyou wo mite kudasai
sentence.english: Please look at this chart.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seikatsu

sentence.kanji: 日本での生活は楽しいです。
sentence.romaji: nihon de no seikatsu ha tanoshii desu
sentence.english: Life in Japan is fun.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's masao

sentence.kanji: 空が真っ青です。
sentence.romaji: sora ga masao desu
sentence.english: The sky is bright blue.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ao

sentence.kanji: 私の好きな色は青です。
sentence.romaji: watashi no suki na iro ha ao desu
sentence.english: My favorite color is blue.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chuugakusei

sentence.kanji: 息子は中学生です。
sentence.romaji: musuko ha chuugakusei desu
sentence.english: My son is a junior high school student.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shougakusei

sentence.kanji: うちの息子は来年、小学生になります。
sentence.romaji: uchi no musuko ha rainen shougakusei ni narimasu
sentence.english: Our son will start primary school next year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's daihyou

sentence.kanji: 彼がクラスの代表だ。
sentence.romaji: kare ga kurasu no daihyou da
sentence.english: He's the class representative.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jikou

sentence.kanji: 彼はその計画を実行した。
sentence.romaji: kare ha sono keikaku wo jikou shita
sentence.english: He executed the plan.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hyougen

sentence.kanji: 彼は歌で自分の気持ちを表現した。
sentence.romaji: kare ha uta de jibun no kimochi wo hyougen shita
sentence.english: He expressed his feelings in song.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's norimono

sentence.kanji: 自転車は便利な乗り物です。
sentence.romaji: jitensha ha benri na norimono desu
sentence.english: Bicycles are a convenient form of transport.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sekinin

sentence.kanji: 彼は失敗の責任を取って、会社を辞めた。
sentence.romaji: kare ha shipai no sekinin wo tote kaisha wo yameta
sentence.english: He took responsibility for the mistake and resigned from the company.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsuukin

sentence.kanji: 毎朝、通勤に30分かかります。
sentence.romaji: maiasa tsuukin ni sanjupun kakarimasu
sentence.english: It takes thirty minutes to commute every morning.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsutomeru

sentence.kanji: 私は銀行に勤めています。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha ginkou ni tsutomete imasu
sentence.english: I'm working for a bank.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seiseki

sentence.kanji: 成績が上がりました。
sentence.romaji: seiseki ga agarimashita
sentence.english: His grades went up.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jouhou

sentence.kanji: 学生たちはインターネットでいろいろな情報を集めた。
sentence.romaji: gakuseitachi ha inta-neto de iroirona jouhou wo atsumeta
sentence.english: The students gathered all kinds of information on the Internet.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's keiyaku

sentence.kanji: その選手は新しいチームと契約した。
sentence.romaji: sono senshu ha atarashii chi-mu to keiyaku shita
sentence.english: That player signed a contract with a new team.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's norikaeru

sentence.kanji: 次の駅で地下鉄に乗り換えます。
sentence.romaji: tsugi no eki de chikatetsu ni norikaemasu
sentence.english: I'm transfering to the subway at the next station.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's norikae

sentence.kanji: 次の駅で乗り換えです。
sentence.romaji: tsugi no eki de norikae desu
sentence.english: I'm transfering at the next station.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's wareru

sentence.kanji: コップが落ちて割れた。
sentence.romaji: kopu ga ochite wareta
sentence.english: The glass fell and broke.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hoshi

sentence.kanji: 今夜は星がよく見えます。
sentence.romaji: konya ha hoshi ga yoku miemasu
sentence.english: You can see the stars clearly tonight.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shizuka

sentence.kanji: 今年の夏休みには静かな所へ行きたい。
sentence.romaji: kotoshi no natsuyasumi ni ha shizuka na tokoro he ikitai
sentence.english: I want to go to a quiet place this summer vacation.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsumoru

sentence.kanji: 雪が積もっています。
sentence.romaji: yuki ga tsumote imasu
sentence.english: The snow has settled.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's umareru

sentence.kanji: 姉夫婦に男の子が生まれました。
sentence.romaji: ane fuufu ni otokonoko ga umaremashita
sentence.english: My sister and her husband had a baby boy.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kokuseki

sentence.kanji: 私は日本国籍です。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha nihon kokuseki desu
sentence.english: I'm a Japanese citizen.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tanjoubi

sentence.kanji: 彼女の誕生日は7月16日です。
sentence.romaji: kanojo no tanjoubi ha shichigatsu juurokunichi desu
sentence.english: Her birthday is July 16th.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jitsugen

sentence.kanji: 夢を実現するには努力が必要です。
sentence.romaji: yume wo jitsugen suru ni ha doryoku ga hitsuyou desu
sentence.english: You need to make an effort to make your dreams come true.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's subarashii

sentence.kanji: 素晴らしい景色ですね。
sentence.romaji: subarashii keshiki desu ne
sentence.english: This is wonderful scenery.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's waru

sentence.kanji: 皿を落として割った。
sentence.romaji: sara wo otoshite wata
sentence.english: I dropped the plate and broke it.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jisai

sentence.kanji: 彼は実際にはあまり背が高くない。
sentence.romaji: kare ha jisai ni ha amari se ga takaku nai
sentence.english: Actually, he's not very tall.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's dorobou

sentence.kanji: 近所に泥棒が入った。
sentence.romaji: kinjo ni dorobou ga haita
sentence.english: There was a burglary in the neighborhood.

cards.english: for life, with all one's might
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ishoukenmei

sentence.kanji: 彼は毎日一生懸命働いている。
sentence.romaji: kare ha mainichi ishoukenmei hataraite iru
sentence.english: He works hard every day.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's omiyage

sentence.kanji: 父はお土産にお菓子を買ってきた。
sentence.romaji: chichi ha omiyage ni okashi wo kate kita
sentence.english: My father bought some sweets as a souvenir.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's umu

sentence.kanji: うちのネコが子猫を生みました。
sentence.romaji: uchi no neko ga koneko wo umimashita
sentence.english: Our cat had kittens.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's miharashi

sentence.kanji: このベランダは見晴らしがいい。
sentence.romaji: kono beranda ha miharashi ga ii
sentence.english: The view from this veranda is good.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kango

sentence.kanji: 漢語はもともと外来語です。
sentence.romaji: kango ha motomoto gairaigo desu
sentence.english: Kanji compounds are originally loanwords.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nasakenai

sentence.kanji: こんなことも知らないとは情けない。
sentence.romaji: konna koto mo shiranai to ha nasakenai
sentence.english: It's pretty sad you don't even know something like that.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ninjou

sentence.kanji: この町の人たちには人情があるね。
sentence.romaji: kono machi no hitotachi ni ha ninjou ga aru ne
sentence.english: The people in this town have humanity.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kokusan

sentence.kanji: このワインは国産です。
sentence.romaji: kono wain ha kokusan desu
sentence.english: This wine is a domestic product.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sanchi

sentence.kanji: その地方はお茶の産地です。
sentence.romaji: sono chihou ha ocha no sanchi desu
sentence.english: The region is a production center for tea leaves.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gakuwari

sentence.kanji: 学割だとだいぶ安いな。
sentence.romaji: gakuwari da to daibu yasui na
sentence.english: It is quite cheap with a student discount.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yakuwari

sentence.kanji: みんなで役割を分担しましょう。
sentence.romaji: minna de yakuwari wo buntan shimashou
sentence.english: Let's give everyone a role.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's wariate

sentence.kanji: チケットの割り当ては1人10枚です。
sentence.romaji: chiketo no wariate ha hitori juumai desu
sentence.english: Ten tickets are allocated per person.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's wariateru

sentence.kanji: 全員に作業が割り当てられました。
sentence.romaji: zenin ni sagyou ga wariateraremashita
sentence.english: Work was assigned to all members.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's waribiki

sentence.kanji: 今日は全品10%割り引きです。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha zenpin 10% waribiki desu
sentence.english: Today all goods are 10% off.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's wariaini

sentence.kanji: 今回のテストは割合に簡単でした。
sentence.romaji: konkai no tesuto ha wariaini kantan deshita
sentence.english: This test was relatively easy.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shinsei

sentence.kanji: これからパスポートの申請に行きます。
sentence.romaji: korekara pasupo-to no shinsei ni ikimasu
sentence.english: I am now going to apply for my passport.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's warikomu

sentence.kanji: 車が前に割り込んできた。
sentence.romaji: kuruma ga mae ni warikonde kita
sentence.english: A car cut in front of me.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ikimono

sentence.kanji: 生き物を大切にしましょう。
sentence.romaji: ikimono wo taisetsu ni shimashou
sentence.english: Let's care about living things.

cards.english: give a discount, make a reduction
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's waribiku

sentence.kanji: 定価から2000円割り引きますよ。
sentence.romaji: teika kara 2 senen waribikimasu yo
sentence.english: I'll deduct 2000 yen from the recommended retail price.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's joushaken

sentence.kanji: 乗車券は無くさないように。
sentence.romaji: joushaken ha nakusanai you ni
sentence.english: Do not lose the ticket.
